title: New: Paeris Giles – Better
body:
Drenched in hazy summertime wooziness, _Better_, the new track from **Paeris Giles** is two minutes of pure loveliness.

With bleary, nostalgic vocals drifting over the minimal guitar lines, this is the perfect soundtrack to a lazy afternoon. Give it a listen below:

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/139640402″ params=”auto\_play=false&hide\_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /\]
